summary: This is an email from August 12, 2019, with the subject line referencing Jeffrey Epstein by his full name and federal registration number. It includes an attachment titled 'MUDD Fnctein Jeffrey Fdward Reg No 7631R-054X docx' and mentions an 'Updated time line.' The document appears to be internal correspondence regarding Epstein's case status shortly after his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email, identified by his full name and federal registration number (76318-054X).

events.title: Internal Email Regarding Epstein
events.description: An email is sent with the subject 'Epstein, Jeffrey Edward, Reg. No. 76318-054X' and includes an attachment and reference to an updated timeline.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 12, 2019, which is two days after Jeffrey Epstein's death in federal custody.
Jeffrey Epstein is referenced by his full name and his federal Bureau of Prisons registration number: 76318-054X.
The email includes an attachment with a filename that appears to be a misspelled or garbled version of 'MUDD Epstein Jeffrey Edward Reg No 7631R-054X.docx'.
The email body or subject references an 'Updated time line,' suggesting ongoing case management or investigation activity related to Epstein post-mortem.
